<Comparable C> int comp(C, C);
comp(c1, c2)
{
  if (c1 < c2)
    return -1;
  else if (c1 == c2)
    return 0;
  else
    return 1;
}

void test_comparable();
test_comparable()
{
  println("### Testing Comparable ###");
  comp(1, 2);
  comp(1.2, 3.14);
  comp(0, 2.0);

  comp(false, true);
}


boolean test1() {
	return comp(1, 2) == -1;
}

boolean test2() {
	return comp(1.2, 3.14) == -1;
}

boolean test3() {
	return comp(0, 2.0) == -1;
}

boolean test4() {
	return comp(false, true) == -1;
}

boolean test5() {
	return comp(1,1) == 0;
}

boolean test6() {
	return comp(1.2,1.2) == 0;
}

boolean test7() {
	return comp(2,2.0) == 0;
}

boolean test8() {
	return comp(3.0,0) == 0;
}

boolean test9() {
	return comp(true,true) == 0;
}
